legal_basis: Section 18.1(1) of the Federal Court Act
application_details: Magnotta used ICEWINE before its publication as an official mark and faced potential marketing restrictions due to VQA's agreement with LCBO, establishing direct interest and standing.
decision_reasoning: Applicants have standing; the Registrar's decision is reasonable and upheld.
cause_of_action: Dispute over VQA's status as a public authority and use of ICEWINE as an official mark.
procedure_followed: Judicial review application filed by Magnotta challenging Registrarâ€™s decision; evidence and arguments presented.
result_of_case: Application dismissed; no declaratory relief granted; costs awarded to VQA.
